title: Strengthening Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Through Collaborative Blended Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A process to experience blended learning design through collaborative learning activities in smartphone-based limited-technology environments and enhance mathematical problem-solving skills

learning_goals: Learners can creatively propose at least one blended learning scenario through collaborative design processes.
Learners can explain at least three mathematical problem-solving strategies using online-offline integrated activities.
Learners can visualize mathematical concepts and create shareable learning materials using digital tools (e.g., smartphone apps).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
